sentence.Network_en: While the lads are golfing, I work out in the gym.
sentence.Network_cn: 小伙子们打高尔夫球的时候，我在健身房锻炼。

sentence.Network_en: He was wearing a cream silk shirt and a tartan golfing cap.
sentence.Network_cn: 他身着一件米色丝绸衬衫，头戴一顶花格子高尔夫球帽。

sentence.Network_en: You can play tennis or go golfing.
sentence.Network_cn: 你可以打网球或高尔夫球。

PerfectNetExp.abs: I have neither time nor money to go golfing ., 我既没有时间 , 也没有钱去玩高尔夫球.
Go play in the golfing version of the Special Olympics ., 去参加特奥版本的高尔夫赛事吧.
Robert Tyre Jones , Jr . , aka " Bobby Jones " ( Caviezel ) rises from complete obscurity to become a golfing legend .影片是根据美国20年代传奇高尔夫球选手鲍比·琼斯的故事改编而成。
when did he start golfing ? one half a years ago .他什么时候开始打高尔夫的？一年半以前。

entry.def: Golfing is used to describe things that involve the playing of golf or that are used while playing golf.

entry.def: Golfing is the activity of playing golf.

example.ex: You can play tennis or go golfing.
example.tran: 你可以打网球或高尔夫球。
